mapper.select: SELECT wls.id, wls.log_id, wls.send_emp_id, wl.type, wl.title, wl.today_content, wl.tomorrow_content, wl.question, wl.create_emp_id, wl.create_time, wl.update_time, e.name AS create_emp_name FROM work_log_send wls LEFT JOIN work_log wl ON wls.log_id = wl.id LEFT JOIN employee e ON wl.create_emp_id = e.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
